sourcesContent:
import { Box, Heading, Input, VStack } from 'native-base'
import React from 'react'
import { View, Text } from 'react-native'
import Colors from '../color'
import { MaterialCommunityIcons } from '@expo/vector-icons';
function LoginScreen() {
  return (
    <Box flex = {1} bg = {Colors.white}>
        <Box 
        w = "full"
        h = "full"
        position = "absolute"
        top = "0"
        px = "6"
        justifyContent="center">
          <Heading>LOGIN</Heading>
          <VStack space={5} pt="6">
           {} /* Email */
            <Input variant="underlined" placeholder="user@gmail.com" w="70%"
              color={Colors.main} borderBottomColor={Colors.underline} pl={2}
              InputLeftElement={<MaterialCommunityIcons name="email" size={20} color="black" />}></Input>
          </VStack>
        </Box>
    </Box>
  )
}

export default LoginScreen
